entries.start_fail_target_not_player: You can only trade with other players.
entries.start_fail_target_ship: You cannot trade with a player in another ship.
entries.err_max_free_trial_money: You are limited to having %DI credits while participating in the free trial of Star Wars Galaxies.  When you purchase Star Wars Galaxies, this limit will be removed.
entries.help_self_container: Place items here that you want to offer as part of the trade.
entries.help_other_accept: This checkbox shows whether the other participanet has accepted the trade conditions.
entries.help_self_accept: Click this checkbox when you find the trade acceptable.
entries.help_other_money: How much money the other participant is willing to offer.
entries.help_self_money: How much money you wish to offer as part of the trade.
entries.help_other_info: The info about the currently selected item.
entries.help_self_info: The description of the currently selected item.
entries.help_other_container: This is where the other participant puts items that they want to trade.
entries.help_other_conta: This is where you put items that you are willing to trade.
entries.err_not_enough_money: You don't have enough credits to make the trade.
entries.err_not_enough_money_prose: You don't have %DI credits on hand to trade.
entries.waiting_complete_prose: Now waiting for %TU to complete the trade...
entries.start_fail_target_other_prose: You cannot start a trade with %TT while you are trading with %TO.
entries.request_player_unreachable_prose: You can't trade with %TT because %ST is unreachable.
entries.request_player_unreachable_no_obj: The person you want to trade with is unreachable.
entries.request_player_denied_no_obj: That person denied your trade request.
entries.request_player_busy_prose: %TU is already trading with someone else.
entries.request_player_busy_no_obj: That person is already trading with someone else.
entries.out_of_range_prose: You are too far away from %TT to trade.  The trade has been cancelled.
entries.aborted: The secure trade has been cancelled.
